raw_text:
Usher leads Billboard nominations
 
 R&B singer Usher is leading the race for the Billboard awards with nominations in 13 categories, including best male.
 
 Alicia Keys has 12 nominations for the awards, which will be held on 8 December at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Other multiple nominees include Maroon5, OutKast, Kanye West, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank and Jay-Z. Soul singer Stevie Wonder will receive Billboard's Century Award, the magazine's highest honour for creative achievement, at the ceremony.
 
 The awards will be hosted by American Idol presenter Ryan Seacrest, and will feature performances by Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly and Green Day. Usher and Keys will be battling it out for prizes including artist of the year, Hot 100 songwriter of the year and Billboard 200 album of the year for their respective albums Confessions and The Diary of Alicia Keys. Maroon5 and OutKast are also up for artist of the year, while OutKast's Speakerboxxx/The Love Below is a finalist for Billboard 200 album of the year, alongside Josh Groban's Closer. The awards honour the year's leading artists and songs as determined by their performance on Billboard's weekly charts.
llama3.2:1b: Usher leads Billboard nominations with 13 categories, including best male artist. Alicia Keys follows with 12 nominations. Other nominees include Maroon5, Kanye West, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank, Jay-Z, Stevie Wonder, and Ryan Seacrest hosts the awards ceremony.
llama3.2:3b: Usher leads nominations with 13, including best male, while Alicia Keys has 12. Stevie Wonder will receive the Century Award. The awards, held on December 8 at MGM Grand in Las Vegas, feature performances by Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly and Green Day, and will be hosted by Ryan Seacrest.
gemma2:2b: Usher leads with 13 Billboard nominations, including artist of the year. Alicia Keys has 12 nominations. Other notable nominees include Maroon5, OutKast, Kanye West, R Kelly, and others.  Stevie Wonder will receive the Century Award at the December 8th ceremony in Las Vegas. Performances from Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly, and Green Day are planned.
qwen2.5:0.5b: Usher has won more awards than anyone else at this year's Billboard Music Awards. He's led a group with 13 nominations and is expected to win 6 of them, while another group, OutKast, has 12 nominations for the awards. Other multiple nominees include Beyoncé, Kanye West, Drake, Gilead, Maroon 5, Outkast, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank, Jay-Z, Stevie Wonder and Soul Sonet. Stevie Wonder will receive Billboard's Century Award in his honour, while other winners include Justin Bieber, Taylor Swift, Maren Morris and The Black Eyed Peas. The awards ceremony is hosted by Ryan Seacrest as well as American Idol presenter Janice Smith with performances by Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly, Green Day and Maroon 5.
qwen2.5:1.5b: Usher leads Billboard nominations with 13 categories; Alicia Keys has 12 nominations; multiple nominees include Maroon5, OutKast, Kanye West, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank, Jay-Z and Stevie Wonder. The awards will be hosted by Ryan Seacrest featuring performances by Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly, and Green Day, with prizes including artist of the year, Hot 100 songwriter of the year, and Billboard 200 album of the year.
qwen2.5:3b: Usher leads with 13 nominations at Billboard awards, including best male category. Alicia Keys has 12 nominations. Other multiple nominees include Maroon5, OutKast, Kanye West, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank, and Jay-Z. Stevie Wonder will receive the Century Award for creative achievement. The ceremony featuring performances by Usher, Gwen Stefani, Nelly, and Green Day will be hosted by Ryan Seacrest on December 8th in Las Vegas. Prizes include artist of the year, Hot 100 songwriter of the year, and Billboard 200 album of the year for Confessions, The Diary of Alicia Keys, and Speakerboxxx/The Love Below.
opencoder:1.5b:
Usher leads Billboard nominations for 13 categories: best male singer, among others.

Alicia Keys has 12 nominations for the awards that will be held in Las Vegas on 8 December at the MGM Grand. Other multiple nominees include Maroon5, OutKast, Kanye West, R Kelly, Gretchen Wilson, Hoobastank and Jay-Z. The artist of the year is Usher with her album Confessions, and the songwriter of the year is Usher.

Alicia Keys also won the Century Award for creative achievement at the ceremony.
